entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 06:39 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 06:39 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:39 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
